scripts.service_create: ibmcloud resource service-instance-create discovery-cos-poc-cos cloud-object-storage lite global && ibmcloud resource service-alias-create discovery-cos-poc-cos-alias --instance-name discovery-cos-poc-cos && ibmcloud service create discovery lite discovery-cos-poc-discovery
scripts.service_delete: ibmcloud resource service-alias-delete discovery-cos-poc-cos-alias --force && ibmcloud resource service-instance-delete discovery-cos-poc-cos --force && ibmcloud service delete discovery-cos-poc-discovery -f
scripts.vcap_services: ibmcloud app env discovery-cos-poc | node node_modules/cfenv-one-liner -p VCAP_SERVICES
